titles: By the Kynge and the Quene the Kynges and Quenes most excellent maiesties, most gracyously considering how that a great quantitie of forged & counterfeit coynes of golde ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.
publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi typographi Regiæ Maiestatis,
notes: "Geuen at our maner of Grenewych the thyrde day of Apryll."
